text: Francis Campbell (1829–1897)Francis “Frank” Campbell at findagrave.com was a member of the Wisconsin State Senate. ==Biography== Campbell was born on June 13, 1829 in County Donegal, Ireland. He settled in Gratiot (town), Wisconsin in 1849. On January 1, 1860, Campbell married Mary J. Cole. They had five children. ==Career== Campbell was elected to the Senate from the 11th District in 1872 and 1874. Other positions he held include Chairman of the Gratiot Town Board and Sheriff of Lafayette County, Wisconsin. He was a Republican. ==References== Category:1829 births Category:1897 deaths Category:Irish emigrants to the United States (before 1923) Category:People from Gratiot, Wisconsin Category:Politicians from County Donegal Category:Wisconsin state senators Category:Wisconsin sheriffs Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Francis Campbell (politician)
